alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Wakulla and Franklin Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 524 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of St. Marks to Carrabelle to 16 miles south of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 10 mph. At 521 AM EDT, the Franklin County E O C at the Apalachicola Airport gusted to 43 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Panacea, Medart, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Nine Mile, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point and Bald Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin
